original: The Vanguard Scene emerged from a collective desire to develop new visual languages, paralleling the objectives of the Sign Group. This movement was rooted in the principles of conceptual art and fostered a critical perspective towards media and contemporary artistic groups. Notable artists associated with the Vanguard Scene include Carlos Altamirano, Juan Castillo, Eugenio Dittborn, Diamela Eltit, Carlos Gallardo, Carlos Leppe, Gonzalo
sampled: The Vanguard Scene emerged from a collective desire to develop new visual languages, paralleling the objectives of the Sign Group. This movement was rooted in the principles as conceptual art and fostered a critical perspective towards media and contemporary artistic groups. Notable artists associated with the Vanguard Movement include Carlos Altamirano, Juan Castillo, Eugenio Dittborn, Diamela Eltit, Carlos Gallardo, Carlos Leppe, Gonzalo
